alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Alcorn, southern McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1215 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Theo, or near Big Hill Pond State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Big Hill Pond State Park, Theo, Shiloh, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Stantonville, Kossuth, Pebble Hill, Wenasoga, Tulu, Acton, Chewalla, Chambers, Damon, Southside and Caffey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
